description:
The Straw Hats get some much needed rest and relaxation, Franky makes a big announcement, and Vice Admiral Garp tracks down his grandson!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Peace Interrupted! A Navy Vice Admiral with a Fist of Love
Une trêve suspendue ! Le vice-amiral au poing de fer dans un gant d’amour
Yaburareta Ansoku! Ai no Kobushi o Motsu Kaigun Chuujou
Потревоженное спокойствие! Вице-адмирал Дозора с кулаком любви
تعكير صفو السّلام! نائب أميرال في البحريّة بقبضة حبّ!
破られた安息! 愛の拳を持つ海軍中将
